body:
Summary
Fail to build cleverleaf on Quartz

### Expected Result

Build succeeds.

### Actual Result
Sample error message:
```
==> Installing cleverleaf
==> Trying to clone git repository: https://github.com/UK-MAC/CleverLeaf_ref.git on branch develop
==> No checksum needed when fetching with git
==> Already staged cleverleaf-develop-c4ab5crprshjpbkfcnmxks2uotp7fcee in /usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/var/spack/stage/cleverleaf-develop-c4ab5crprshjpbkfcnmxks2uotp7fcee
==> No patches needed for cleverleaf
==> Building cleverleaf [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/var/spack/stage/cleverleaf-develop-c4ab5crprshjpbkfcnmxks2uotp7fcee/CleverLeaf_ref' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/cleverleaf-develop-c4ab5crprshjpbkfcnmxks2uotp7fcee' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=RelWithDebInfo' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=FALSE' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/cleverleaf-develop-c4ab5crprshjpbkfcnmxks2uotp7fcee/lib;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/cleverleaf-develop-c4ab5crprshjpbkfcnmxks2uotp7fcee/lib64;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/boost-1.67.0-4o7ppmfndrptsforhdf2um3fawy737dg/lib;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/bzip2-1.0.6-ocokiv4gyfgsngehfu2xclts4sh3az73/lib;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/zlib-1.2.11-3r4cfkmx3wwfqeof4bc244yduu2mz4ur/lib;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/hdf5-1.10.2-sggljgyfrunpnkwgxddjuyifcs7ec64l/lib;/usr/tce/packages/mvapich2/mvapich2-2.2-intel-17.0.2/lib;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/samrai-3.12.0-2ats4u6bmxj2ofn6qhvgxcgwj4bepoyq/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/cmake-3.11.3-ocfk6khk3z6t2lt4nbevkty5b4htf3el;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/boost-1.67.0-4o7ppmfndrptsforhdf2um3fawy737dg;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/samrai-3.12.0-2ats4u6bmxj2ofn6qhvgxcgwj4bepoyq;/usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/hdf5-1.10.2-sggljgyfrunpnkwgxddjuyifcs7ec64l'

1 error found in build log:
     12    -- Check for working Fortran compiler: /usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gfortran  -- works
     13    -- Detecting Fortran compiler ABI info
     14    -- Detecting Fortran compiler ABI info - done
     15    -- Checking whether /usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gfortran supports Fortran 90
     16    -- Checking whether /usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gfortran supports Fortran 90 -- yes
     17    -- Found SAMRAI: /usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/samrai-3.12.0-2ats4u6bmxj2ofn6qhvgxcgwj4bepoyq/include
  >> 18    CMake Error at /usr/workspace/wsa/wang102/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/cmake-3.11.3-ocfk6khk3z6t2lt4nbevkty5b4htf3el/share/cmake-3.11/Modules/Fin
           dHDF5.cmake:204 (try_compile):
     19      Unknown extension ".c" for file
     20
     21        /tmp/wang102/spack-stage/spack-stage-qDti5j/CleverLeaf_ref/spack-build/CMakeFiles/hdf5/cmake_hdf5_test.c
     22
     23      try_compile() works only for enabled languages.  Currently these are:
     24
```
### Steps to reproduce the issue
```
spack install cleverleaf
```
### Information on your system

Machine: Quartz
spack branch: * develop cea5d04 Fix GDAL Python bindings and add import tests (#8482)
title: Fail to build cleverleaf on Quartz
